SEARCH

Package edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.device

package edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.device
The device package represents all of the resources available on an FPGA device (part name, tiles, primitive sites and routing resources). All information about FPGA devices is parsed from XDLRC and placed in compact device files for faster loading. See Technical Report and Documentation for more information.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.device.browser
    This package contains the main classes to run the Device Browser tool in RapidSmith.
    edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.device.helper
    The device.helper package is a set of classes which are used for creating and populating the Device class and other classes in the device package.
  • Class
    Description
    Device
    This is the main class that stores information about each Xilinx part.
    DeviceFilesCreator
    This class has a number of static methods to create Device and WireEnumerator objects from XDLRC files.
    PIPRouteThrough
    This class is used to represent the Route-Through constructs of XDLRC/XDL in association with PIPs.
    PrimitivePinMap
    This is a helper class to help keep the Device files compact.
    PrimitiveSite
    This class represents the primitive sites found in XDLRC files.
    PrimitiveType
    This enum enumerates all of the Primitive types of the following FPGA families: kintex7 spartan2 spartan2e spartan3 spartan3a spartan3adsp spartan3e spartan6 virtex virtex2 virtex2p virtex4 virtex5 virtex6 virtex7 virtexe
    SinkPin
    Keeps track of tile offsets for switch matrix sinks in Device/Tile class.
    Tile
    This class represents the same information found and described in XDLRC files concerning Xilinx FPGA tiles.
    TileType
    This enum enumerates all of the Tile types of the following FPGA families: kintex7 spartan2 spartan2e spartan3 spartan3a spartan3adsp spartan3e spartan6 virtex virtex2 virtex2p virtex4 virtex5 virtex6 virtex7 virtexe
    Utils
    This is a helper class for creating PrimitiveTypes and TileTypes as well as helping to categorize TileTypes.
    WireConnection
    A Wire is described simply as an integer representing the wire and a row/column tile offset from the source wire.
    WireDirection
     
    WireEnumerator
    This utility class creates and governs the translation of the wires enumeration value from its actual name.
    WireType
     
    XDLRCParser
    This class is designed to parse the XDLRC files to create the compact device files used by XDL Tools.
